text: meụ̄̀x phwk s̄ạbplạb (mu nā fi nkūn) mā h̄ā cêā phwk k̄heā kl̀āw ẁā reā k̄hx pt̩iỵāṇ ẁā thæ̂cring th̀ān pĕn r̀x sūl k̄hx ngxạllxḥˌ tæ̀ xạllxḥˌ thrng rū̂ dī yìng ẁā thæ̂cring cêā nận pĕn r̀x sūl k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ xỳāng næ̀nxn læa xạllxḥˌ thrng pĕn phyān ẁā thæ̂cring phwk mu nā fikī n nận pĕn p̄hū̂ kl̀āw thĕc xỳāng næ̀nxn
